channel.title: Products stocks setting on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Product Settings - Allow ordering of out-of-stock products & Enable stock management
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Product Settings - Allow ordering of out-of-stock products & Enable stock management Details Component : Core Status : [TEST] To be automated Automated on : 1.7.8.x, 1.7.7.x, 8.0.x, 8.1.x Scenario : https://forge.prestashop.com/browse/TEST-1074 Steps Step Description Expected result Go in BO > Catalog > Product Product page displayed Click on a quantity of a product Quantities page of product displayed Set the Quantity to 0 and Save Notification “Settings updated” is showed Click to preview Product page of this product displayed on FO
